reviews.review:
Играл в неё, когда у меня ещё не было интернета. Отличная графика для своего времени, а это был 2004 год. Проходил игру не раз. Сюжет потрясающий, но для полноты нужно проходить эпизоды 1,2 (это не минус, а плюс). Звуковое  сопровождение тоже отличное. Игра по своей сути ещё и хоррор.
Единственное то, что немного деревянно как-то все как в шутерах конца девяностых или начала 2000-x - типа call of duty...имею ввиду открытие дверей и взаимодействие с окружающим миром. Например, чтобы открыть дверь я жму кнопку действия и дверь открывается сама - нет анимации рук. Персонаж перемещается деревянно, не видно что во время ходьбы он бы как-то двигал руками - оружие в руках и оно не движется.
Один минус - деревянность.

História, jogabilidade, ação, física.

What else is there to say? This is an era-defining game. Other games have done sci-fi better. Other games have done fps better. Other games have done dystopian moods better. But for my money, HL2 puts them together in the best way possible. Tenouttaten.
Fuck me 10/10

Half-Life 2 foi lançado há mais de 10 anos, e ainda assim, não consigo imaginar nenhum jogo com game design tão bem elaborado.

O primeiro ponto peculiar é a forma pela qual a história é contada: Apesar dos dialogos e personagens principais, a maior parte do plot é adquirido empiricamente. Os cenários são sua fonte de conhecimento, as informações estão dispersas por onde você passa. Ninguém te diz o que a Universal Union faz, já fez, ou almeja alcançar. E nem precisa, você descobre sozinho. E, não é só o enredo que segue essa lógica, as mecanicas do jogo são introduzidas de forma similar. Coisas extremamente relevantes são ensinadas a todo momento sem ficar na cara.

Os exemplos são incontáveis, mas há um interessante bem no inicio do jogo: Você está próximo de um corredor infestado de Barnacles (aka puxa com a lingua), matar todos para prosseguir seria tedioso e gastaria muita munição. A solução correta é jogar barris explosivos no corredor e deixa-los puxar com a lingua. Mas, estamos no inicio do jogo (e um jogo com física sem precedentes na época), como introduzir essa noção ao jogador? O mais comum são tutoriais ou companions jogando essa informação na sua cara, provavelmente através de dialogos. HL, no entanto, se baseia no learn by experience: Há uma sala, pouco antes da citada anteriormente, na qual você esbarra em um barril não-explosivo. Tal barril está num plano inclinado, o que o faz rolar downhill, na direção de dois Barnacles. Inevitavelmente, um dos barnacles puxa o barril (e logo cuspe, sem efeitos colaterais). See? O jogo acabou de te ensinar uma mecanica!

Esse é o exemplo mais cabal, em um dos primeiros capítulos do jogo. Agora imagine isso pelo jogo inteiro, visto que mecanicas novas são introduzidas a todo momento. É genial. Em suma, esse é um dos jogos mais bem elaborados de todos os tempos, se nunca jogou, vale a pena.

Very awesome and Unique game, the plot is layed out so nicely and its constantly leaving you in deep thoughts and leaving you to think outside the box, along with throwing yourself into deep thought with constant questions about the game that force you to connect the dots,  and figure things out yourself! Its connection to the Portal games is amazing as well! I could go on in a whole paragraph about the connection and why we dont have a 3rd game ;)!
Still fun.

TLDR; 9.4 / 10,  top-selling game worldwide for 2007.
War rages on in the fourth edition of Activision's acclaimed war game. For the first time in the series, Call of Duty moves away from WWII to the modern battlefield. Armed with an arsenal of advanced and powerful modern day firepower, players are transported to treacherous hotspots around the globe to take on a rogue enemy group threatening the world. As both a U.S Marine and British S.A.S. soldier fighting through an unfolding story full of twists and turns, players use sophisticated technology, superior firepower and coordinated land and air strikes on a battlefield where speed, accuracy and communication are essential to victory. The epic title also delivers an added depth of multiplayer action providing online fans an all-new community of persistence, addictive and customizable gameplay.
Truly an achievement of the times.

Half-Life 1: 10/10

un exelente titulo, vale la pena comprar este juego, te pasaras unas grandes horas de diversion y te enamoraras de los grandes personajes que te entregara este juego

Gameplay: Gameplay in Half Life 2 is absolutely perfect. Each weapon is extremely fun to use, and offers different playstyles. You can be a long range sniper with the crossbow, an up close and personal monster with the shotgun, an explosive deviant with the Rocket Launcher or Grenades, or you can just walk up and smash a Combine Soldier's head in with a crowbar. Gameplay is smooth, flawless, and the power of the Source Engine makes it feel like a real battle. Easy mode is easy, Hard mode is hard. Then, Valve does what revolutionized gaming back during Half Life 1, with a perfect blend between story and gameplay, OBLITERATING the use of Cinematic cut-scenes as they mold them into the game itself. Verdict: 10/10

Story: Half Life 2's Story, is VERY good. You wake up, twenty years after the Black Mesa Incident, and the entire world is taken over. Wait, what? You beat the Nihilanth, you SAVED Earth, what happened? Don't fret, Half Life 2 brings a PERFECT reasoning for it. You walk out of the train station, after witnessing the brutality of the Civil Protection that inhabit it, only to come face to face, with the monolithic Citadel, the symbol of the Combine's power. It stands far up in the sky, and you can see it from most out door areas in the game too! The story puts in a sense of urgency as you have to do the impossible, defeat the Combine Empire. Verdict: 10/10

Music: Music in Half Life 2 is phenomonal. You see, a problem in a lot of games is that they try to be TOO good with their music. They make the music so independent of the game, that it almost seems like a different part of it, a droning tune in the background while you slaughter demons or conquer a City. Half Life 2, on the other hand, perfects it. Ambience is a HUGE part of the soundtrack. The music isn't just music, it's the game itself. For instance, there comes a point where you must traverse under a huge bridge, trains roaming over head. With each train comes the rattling of the metal supports you climb over, a tense moment, and then the ambience kicks in, a slow overtone as it heightens your senses, making you pray that you don't fall to your death. But of course, ambience isn't the only part. There come plenty of moments where the music is active, action packed, and with high intensity as you fight off Headcrab Zombies, or mow down Overwatch Soldiers. Verdict: 10/10

Bugs/Glitches: Bugs, are always existent in games. Some games have more than others, and some are harder to find, or may require exploitation to discover. Half Life 2, like all games, has its bugs and glitches. However, you can go throughout the entire game without experiencing a single bug. Now, there is only ONE bug that can be quite a problem, and that is simply because the game is not exactly optimized for modern software, which includes a graphical error which removes a lot of lighting details. This is easily fixable. Verdict: 9/10

Graphics: This game was made in 2004, and yet, at the Highest Setting, this game still looks VERY nice for 2016. It has aged very well, and it has good graphics in the first place! While they aren't phenomonal compared to now, they are certainly good for their time. Verdict: 8/10

Summary:

This has to be one of, if not, THE BEST game I have ever played. It revolutionized the FPS genre and DESTROYED the challenge of being a worthy sequel.

Final Verdict: 10/10

[h1]Образец для подражания[/h1]

Даже уже не сосчитать, - сколько раз демонстрировал [b]Half-Life2[/b] друзьям и интересующимся играми знакомым, дабы показать - что есть [u]правильная игра[/u]. 
[list]
[*] Есть хороший и продуманный сюжет. Да и к тому же способ его подачи  - фишка всей серии.   
[*] Дизайн локаций продумывался ДЛЯ сюжета и игрового процесса. 
[spoiler]Это признак правильного подхода. Ибо есть немало образцов, где видно, что  сначало придумали пафосные и цепляющие сцены; а уж потом на это все накатили какой-то сюжет [/spoiler] 
[*]Ну и как следствие. Когда все в игре сосредотачивается на истории (и нтересной его подаче)  -  это чревато  появлением многих и многих сценарных и геймплейных находок. Вот и здесь так. Уже упомянутый подход к повествованию; физика объектов  и то, что её можно применять не только для красивых взрывов; лицевая анимация (даже сейчас прилично смотриться); по делу применяемая музыка (саундтрек к тому же самодостаточен + отлично слушается отдельно) и много еще чего. Каких-то запомнившися всем ситуаций и мелочей. [spoiler]Например ловушки отца Григория; КРАСНЫЙ АМБАР; процесс проникновения в Цитадель и т.д. и т.п. и пр.[/spoiler]        
[*] Некая технологическая завершенность. По техническим причинам, впервые ознакомился с игрой на компьютере. где стояла Windows98[b](!)[/b] Потом обновился до XP... И вот недавно запускал на Windows 10 и  Ubuntu. Игра все так же отлично работает. Даже принимает вменямо собранные моды.     
[/list]
  
P.S. Как и про все великое, -  про Half-Life 2 можно еще много чего добавить. Но незачем. Её лучше познать самостоятельно... И находить в ней еще что-нибудь незамеченное ранее. Снова и снова.
Sehr gute Story.
